name: css-animation-timing
description: Css module of single purpose classes for animation timing

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-animation-timing.css > css/css-animation-timing.css && tachyons src/css-animation-timing.css --minify > css/css-animation-timing.min.css && tachyons src/css-animation-timing.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
